Name: aggfnoid
Description: pg_proc oid of the aggregate function

Name: aggkind
Description: aggregate kind: n for "normal" aggregates, o for "ordered-set" aggregates, or h for "hypothetical-set" aggregates

Name: aggnumdirectargs
Description: number of direct (non-aggregated) arguments of an ordered-set or hypothetical-set aggregate, counting a variadic array as one argument. if equal to pronargs, the aggregate must be variadic and the variadic array describes the aggregated arguments as well as the final direct arguments. always zero for normal aggregates.

Name: aggmtransfn
Description: forward transition function for moving-aggregate mode (zero if none)

Name: aggminvtransfn
Description: inverse transition function for moving-aggregate mode (zero if none)

Name: aggmfinalfn
Description: final function for moving-aggregate mode (zero if none)

Name: aggfinalextra
Description: true to pass extra dummy arguments to aggfinalfn

Name: aggmfinalextra
Description: true to pass extra dummy arguments to aggmfinalfn

Name: aggtranstype
Description: data type of the aggregate function's internal transition (state) data

Name: aggtransspace
Description: approximate average size (in bytes) of the transition state data, or zero to use a default estimate

Name: aggmtranstype
Description: data type of the aggregate function's internal transition (state) data for moving-aggregate mode (zero if none)

Name: aggmtransspace
Description: approximate average size (in bytes) of the transition state data for moving-aggregate mode, or zero to use a default estimate

Name: agginitval
Description: the initial value of the transition state. this is a text field containing the initial value in its external string representation. if this field is null, the transition state value starts out null.

Name: aggminitval
Description: the initial value of the transition state for moving-aggregate mode. this is a text field containing the initial value in its external string representation. if this field is null, the transition state value starts out null.
